message: Let's split it fairly, Bob. Accept and we can end this.
Let's meet in the middle, Alice. A fair split, but not too generous.
You're being too stingy, Bob! I'll give you a slightly better deal this time.
Alice, you're getting closer, but I'm still not convinced. You can do better.
I'm not getting any younger, Bob. I'll give you a decent deal, but this is my final offer.
Alice, I'm not budging. You're getting the short end of the stick if you don't accept my offer.
I'm not getting any younger, Bob. This is my last offer. Take it or leave it.
